title: Ananda Bhava
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out, Indo-Chinese
description: Part of the Ananda Bhavan chain of restaurants, the oldest restaurant group in Singapore (since 1924). Serves a variety of 100% vegan/vegetarian North Indian, South Indian, and Indian-Chinese cuisines. Has a dosa corner consisting of 58 varieties of dosas, served with chutneys and Sambar. Uses only fresh ingredients with no preservatives and no reused oil.
